reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress sparkly and gorgeous, particularly noting it's perfect for solid gold theme parties and girls' nights out. The dress receives positive feedback for its comfort, with customers mentioning it's not too itchy, and they appreciate its amazing color and good value for money. The fit and size receive mixed reviews - while some say it's true to size, others find it too big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Night Out Party Dress!
items.body: Loved this dress! I am 5'5", 132 lbs, and wear a small. I felt it was a little loose, but still looked great. I received a TON of compliments on our night out at The Neil Diamond Musical. I needed some sparkle, and this dress certainly brought it in spades. I purchased in silver, and it has an inner lining, so it was not see-through. It was very comfortable - I wore for over six hours. The sequins were perfect, caught the light so I shined everywhere I went. I kept things very simple, and didn't add any jewelry, as the dress has enough draw on its own. So, if you are looking for something fancy, but don't want to spend a lot - you can put your money here, and not worry about purchasing a ton of accessories! I would highly recommend this dress to anyone who is looking for some fun and sparkle on their night out. Read more
items.author: Shae Ra

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Birthday dress
items.body: Loved this fun and flirty dress, felt comfortable and sexy, length was good and not too itchy like I thought. Dress has a slip under so that helps with no itchy due to fabric and not see thru at all Read more
items.author: Beatriz Hernandez

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Gold, Silver, Pink, Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
